tool.name: Delete Features from Sequence Database

param.name: delete_type
param.label: Select what you would like to delete from SeqDB *

option.help: Will delete any features from SeqDB. Can be used to delete features found through ITSx tool.
Will delete any determinations (taxonomy) from SeqDB. Can be used to delete determinations found through Find LCA tool.

param.name: ifile
param.label: File with list of IDs from Sequence Database
param.help: File that contains ONLY IDs of items that will be deleted from SeqDB. File format: IDs can be on a separate line; one line, separated by comma or tab.

data.name: delete_failed_feature_ids
data.label: Feature ids that failed to be deleted

data.name: SeqDB_delete_log
data.label: Log file of deleting ITSx features from SeqDB

tool.help:
**What it does**
Deletes items from SeqDB.
Expected input is the type of items to be deleted and file with SeqDB ids. Ids can be tab delimited, comma separated, one on each line or a combination of all the above.
**What is a "Sequence Database Configuration File"?**
Sequence Database Configuration File is a file that contains SeqDB API connection parameters. To generate this file, use "SeqDB Configuration" tool.
